name: Grub's Up
description:
Welcome to the ocean planet of Aquarius.

This is your first day working at the finest restaurant in the universe, 'Grub's Up'.

The only place where you can find the latest taste sensation to sweep the galaxy, Aquadillo.

Search the underwater caves below the ocean surface to find these tasty grubs, but hurry up, diners are waiting!

*****

Made for the Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #4: Underwater

April 8th - April 11th 2022
